LanguageData.ATB_DroneWatchdog.label: Watchdog unit
LanguageData.ATB_DroneWatchdog.description: These drone units are unique in many ways - programmable for a wide range of tasks both military and civilian in nature, heavily armed and yet disarmingly affectionate, charge-capable and command-responsive - and are thus a well known line of mechanical biomimetics. Many serve as companions, as fearsome scouts, as mobile surveillance, or even as sappers.\n\nTheir lethality and violent capabilities have certainly earned them a reputation - a reputation they almost seem keen to keep.
LanguageData.ATB_DroneWatchdog.tools.0.label: left claw
LanguageData.ATB_DroneWatchdog.tools.1.label: right claw
LanguageData.ATB_DroneWatchdog.tools.3.label: head
